mapper.select: SELECT ATTENCE_ID attenceId, ORG_NAME orgName, PERSON_ID personId, WORK_NO workNo, PERSON_NAME personName, PERSON_MOBILE personMobile, ATTENCE_PLACE attencePlace, (SELECT POSITION_NAME FROM tb_area_position WHERE POSITION_CODE = A.ATTENCE_PLACE) attencePlaceName, DATE_FORMAT(ATTENCE_TIME,'%H:%i') attenceTime, WORK_CONTENT workContent, FILES_URL filesUrl, REMARK remark FROM tb_attence A WHERE WORK_NO = #{employeeCode} AND DATE_FORMAT(ATTENCE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{date} ORDER BY ATTENCE_TIME
SELECT COUNT(POSITION_CODE) count FROM tb_area_position A WHERE POSITION_CODE = #{position}
